@stubbornella @torgo @phae Ha ha. Nice. I guess it might be seen as a dirty word if placed in exclusive opposition to "substance". (As with the 99.9% vs 0.1% assertion) There is more substance to the things described by the word, than to the word itself. But isn't that how such words work? I dunno!
